column4: I need some help. I need shut down X and install a driver through a TTY (I think it's called TTy atleast) but when I try "gdm stop" or "init 3" or just switch to a tty (ctrl+alt+2) I always end up with a blank screen and a blinkin cursor to my upper left. Any ideas what I can do to solve this?
maybeawat36: lol I didn't think of that! Thanks m8. :)
Sorry for missspelling your name. And thanks again :)
